Author: Meisterlala
Name: Neko Fans NSFW 18+ Patch
Description:
This Plugin does nothing on its own. Neko Fans needs to be installed.
You now have access to NSFW images in Neko Fans.
Punchline: Frustrated in a dungeon? Look at a cute cat girl! Or look at sexy anime tiddies!

Author: Lichie
Name: LMeter
Description: Renders ACT combat log data as a plugin instead of using a web based overlay
Punchline: Plugin to display ACT combat log data.

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: Mini
Description: Additionally can minimize game to tray or create game's tray icon
Punchline: Adds a button and a command to minimize your game into taskbar

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: DSR Toolbox
Description:
Current functions:
Resolve eyes position
Wroth flames automarker (whole group and personal)
Tether to your chain partner
Punchline: A helper plugin for Dragonsong's Reprise (Ultimate).

Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: HaselTweaks
Description: Keep on tweaking.
Punchline: A collection of quality of life tweaks.

Author: UnknownX
Name: NoClippy
Description: Reduces the effects of lag on certain aspects of the game, such as weaving and statuses. Usable as an alternative, or in addition, to XivAlexander.
Punchline: Reduces the effects of lag on certain aspects of the game, and can show GCD clips

Author: KangasZ
Name: Radar Plugin
Description:
Radar to see enemies, objects, and interactables through walls.
This is an ESP, please don't use it to call aliens down.
Please report any issues to the author.
Punchline: See everything through walls
Changelog:
Fonts are broken and will be fixed eventually
Added player-based options via AccountId
Updated the local mobs ui with some new features

Author: UnknownX
Name: ReAction
Description: Improves aspects of the battle system with action stacks (like MOAction) and various QoL settings.
Punchline: QoL for the battle system.
Changelog: Fixed an issue with queuing some charged actions.

Author: attick, daemitus, Khayle
Name: XIV Combo Expanded
Description: This plugin condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button. For example, a 1-2-3 combo would become 1-1-1.
Punchline: Condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button.

Author: attick, daemitus, VariableVixen
Name: XIV Combo Very Expanded
Description: This plugin condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button. To a degree that some would call absurd, but that's why it's all configurable. Let the players decide.
Punchline: Why can't I hold all these buttons?

Author: daemitus, croizat
Name: Something Need Doing (Expanded Edition)
Description: Now for more than crafting!
Punchline: Work work.

Author: Kouzukii, VeroFess��tmingyuan
Name: Price Insight CN
Punchline: �������ͣʱ�鿴��Ʒ�г��۸�! �ò��ΪPrice Insight�ĺ����档

Author: UnknownX
Name: DalamudRepoBrowser
Punchline: Browse and add third party repositories in an instant
Description: An interface for browsing and managing third party repositories.

Author: daemitus, MidoriKami
Name: ezFauxHollows
Description: This plugin highlights tiles in Faux Hollows that represent the best potential action you can take.
Punchline: Highlights recommended tiles in Faux Hollows for your next move.

Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: LeveHelper
Description: A little helper to check which Levequests have been completed and which are missing.
Punchline: A little helper for Levequests.

Author: Asteria Nocturna
Name: Divination.AetheryteLinkInChat
Description: Display a teleport link to the nearest aetherite for the map link from the in-game chat. Type /alic to configure the plugin.
Punchline: Quick teleport for mob hunts and treasure hunts!

Author: Sevii
Name: Material UI
Description: Auto updating Material UI with customizable accent color and more. Icon by Mek

Author: Drahsid
Name: Better Shadows
Description: Directly adjust the distance of each shadow cascade! Now introducing 4k shadowmap!
Punchline: Take control of your shadows!

Author: Drahsid
Name: Hybrid Camera
Description: Hybrid camera/movement mode! Move freely!
Punchline: Legacy and standard movement in one! Move freely!

Author: Drahsid
Name: Resizable HUD
Description: Allows you to more freely and precisely scale and position HUD elements.
Punchline: Move and scale vanilla hud elements to your liking!

Author: Drahsid
Name: Target Lines
Description: Customizable target lines
Punchline: Customizable target lines

Author: NightmareXIV and AsunaTsuki
Name: DynamicBridge
Punchline: 可以根据设置的各种条件来自动更改角色外观。
Description: 通过设置规则预设，利用与其他流行插件的集成，使得角色外观随情境的变化自动无缝切换，丰富你的游戏体验，增加沉浸感。

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: HuntTrainAssistant
Punchline: Hunt train assistance tool.
Description: Provides useful tools for hunt trains such as: highlighting conductor messages and muting all other chat, auto-opening flags from conductors and auto-teleporting to announced destination.
Changelog: - Issues where plugin would not switch instance after teleporting should be fixed

Author: NightmareXIV / NiGuangOwO（汉化&适配）
Name: Lifestream
Punchline: 一个加速以太网旅行和跨服的插件。
Description:
- 一键传送到任何服务器或以太网目的地
- 单击区域地图内的以太水晶以传送到它们

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: WeathermanExtras
Punchline: Experimental Weatherman functions.
Description: Experimental Weatherman functions. Use at your own risk.
Changelog: - 7.1 update

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: TextAdvance
Punchline: Quest speedrunning assistance tool. Automatically skips subtitle boxes and confirms cutscene skipping
Changelog: - Final 7.1 update

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: AntiAfkKick
Punchline: 防止挂机被自动踢下线，安装后生效，没设置项。

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: SelectString
Punchline: Select items in menus via 0-9 keys rather than mouse.
Description: Numpad is also supported. Note: some menus, like World Visit, are not supported, and whether they will be in future or not remains a question.
Changelog: - 7.1 update

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: Prioritizer
Punchline: Prioritizer sets game's priority to high while crafting.
Description: Prioritizer sets game's priority to high while crafting. No more failed crafts due to random lags while game is minimized.
Changelog: - 7.1 update

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: UnloadErrorFuckOff
Punchline: [For plugin developers only] A plugin that clears off load and unload errors.
Description: [For plugin developers only] A plugin that clears off load and unload errors. Plugin development is made easy once again!
Changelog: - 7.1 update

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: Imagenation
Punchline: An image drawing backend. To be used together with Triggernometry.
Description: An image drawing backend. To be used together with Triggernometry.

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: ObjectExplorer
Punchline: A convenient way to explore current objects around you.
Description: A convenient way to explore current objects around you. Currently supports players only.
Changelog: - 7.1 update

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: Battlevest
Punchline: Battle LeveQuest Helper
Changelog: - 7.1 update

Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: HaselDebug
Description: For developers.
Punchline: Various tools to debug things.
Changelog:
- Added: Unlock tabs Fish and Spearfish.
- Updated: It's now possible to click on the NPC name in the Satisfaction Supply tab to teleport to the closest aetheryte.
- Updated: Currency Manager tab got a little facelift.
- Updated: Namespaces in xml docs are now truncated based on the parents namespace.
- Fixed: A parsing issue with multiple c-tags on a single xml doc line.
- Fixed: Hidden achievements displayed the description in the tooltip when the Hide Spoilers checkbox was enabled.
- Updated: ClientStructs now at cc98a564

Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: MogMogCheck
Description: MogMogCheck is a small plugin to assist you in tracking the rewards of the Moogle Treasure Trove event (called Mog Mog Kollektion in German, hence the name).
Punchline: Tracking assistant for Moogle Treasure Trove rewards
Changelog: Update for Dawntrail.

Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: Yo-kai Check
Description: Yo-kai Check is a small plugin to assist you in tracking the rewards of the Yo-kai Watch event.
Punchline: Tracking assistant for Yo-kai Watch rewards
Changelog:
- Added: The server info bar entry can not be clicked to open the plugin window.
- Added: The server info bar entry now shows the locations in which you can farm the medals in the tooltip.
- Added: In the table, the medal count of each weapon now also has a tooltip that shows the locations in which you can farm them. A location displayed in a green color is your current location.
- Added: In the table, the minion name can now be clicked to summon it and will be shown in a green color when it is currently summoned.
- Changed: The server info bar entry is now based on the currently summoned minion (previously it was based on inventory changes - the medals that were added) and will persist between zones until the minion is sent away or the weapon has been acquired.

Author: VariableVixen
Name: TinyCommands
Description: Adds tiny and simple but useful chat commands, and nothing more. It doesn't even have a UI.

Author: VariableVixen
Name: WoLua
Description: Write custom chat commands by creating lua scripts

Author: VariableVixen
Name: XivEsp
Description: If you've ever spent ten minutes looking for your hunt target, this is the plugin for you. Set a case-insensitive substring, glob, or regular expression, and all nearby game objects with matching names will be tagged on your screen!

Author: veyn
Name: Satisfier
Punchline: Simplify custom deliveries.
Description: Make custom deliveries less annoying by automating the process.

Author: veyn
Name: V(ery) Island
Punchline: Automate island sanctuary activities
Description: Automate gathering, workshop assignments, etc.

Author: veyn
Name: vnavmesh
Punchline: Move around!
Description: Utility to automatically move the character around in the world, skilfully avoiding any obstacles.

Author: veyn
Name: Easier Faux Hollows
Punchline: Faux Hollows solver based on known patterns
Description: Based on ezFauxHollows, but uses known patterns instead of general-purpose solver.

Author: veyn
Name: Boss Mod
Description: 20241111-请支持逆光喵，谢谢喵-画得更全喵
Changelog: 请支持逆光喵，谢谢喵
Punchline: Don't fail at raid mechanics anymore

Author: veyn
Name: vfallguy
Punchline: Get that achievement!
Description: Bot that does fall guys event automatically.

Author: Taurenkey
Name: Saucy
Punchline: When working for MGP is too much effort.
Description: Automates certain Gold Saucer mini-games.
Changelog: - Fixed issue where not selecting a deck would not click the recommended button.

Author: kawaii, NightmareXIV
Name: Avarice
Punchline: Positional feedback with pixel perfect rear/flank tracking, range indicators, and more.
Description: Positional feedback with pixel perfect rear/flank tracking, range indicators, and more.

Author: Taurenkey, kawaii
Name: Artisan
Punchline: A 'simple' crafting plugin.
Description: The all-in-one crafting plugin. Perfect for people with next to no knowledge about crafting rotations. No need for a library of different macros, the solvers will work dynamically to try and complete your crafts. Also provides convenient ways to craft lists of items or grind out a specific item repeatedly.
Changelog: - IPC fixes.

Author: 53m1k0l0n/Gidedin (Puni.sh) / NiGuangOwO (本地化)
Name: LazyLoot
Punchline: 一(自)键(动)Roll点用的 (在线安装Only)
Description:
带有各种参数的Roll点命令 need | greed | pass
聊天和Toast输出以及Roll点延迟。

Author: kawaii, NightmareXIV
Name: AutoRetainer
Punchline: Collect and assign ventures to your retainers from the comfort of your bed.
Description: Collect and assign ventures to your retainers from the comfort of your bed.
Changelog: - Add "Last logged in character" to auto-login upon game start

Author: kawaii, NightmareXIV
Name: Orbwalker
Punchline: S P A C E G L I D I N G
Description: Locks player movement while casting and allows for maximum caster uptime during the course of a fight.

Author: Taurenkey (Puni.sh) / NiGuangOwO (本地化&功能维护)
Name: Pandora's Box
Punchline: 你敢打开潘多拉的盒子吗？（在线安装 Only）
Description: Pandora's Box是一个改善游戏体验和一些功能调整的集合
Changelog: 优化 [国服限定] 招募自动续期

Author: Det, Taurenkey
Name: AutoHook
Punchline: Makes fishing less (or more) boring
Description: It hooks the fish for you, can you believe it?

Author: NightmareXIV, kawaii
Name: Splatoon
Punchline: Redefining FFXIV navigation with unlimited, precise waymarks.
Description: Splatoon is a powerful accessibility tool. It revolutionizes gameplay with its custom waymark system, offering the ability to create unlimited grouped waymarks, labels, and actor indicators with exacting pixel precision. This feature empowers players by making crucial objects and events more visually discernible, thereby facilitating quicker reactions. However, it's important to note that the plugin does not come pre-loaded with presets. Players have the freedom to craft their own or import existing ones, offering a personalized touch to their gaming experience.
Changelog:
- Added importing and exporting script configuration presets
- Added quick script configuration switching from script table
- Added mass script configuration switching
- Added extra trusted script sources and extra repo update list URLs for script developers

Author: daemitus, kawaii
Name: Yes Already
Punchline: Clicks Yes in various dialogs you've specified.
Description: Tired of clicking yes in Praetorium? Can't stand using keys in dungeons? Well do I have the plugin for you! Yes Already is specifically designed to click all the annoying dialogs you've grown accustomed facerolling. Just enter the dialog text, and you'll never see it again! Also works with /regex/ and has several built-in modules for dialogs that aren't quite yes/no prompts but act like it (like desynth).

Author: Team Wrath
Name: Wrath Combo
Punchline: Condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button - and then some.
Description: Turns one action into many! Similar to how PvP actions work, we take an action and build a whole combo out of it. Sometimes it's as simple as a 1-2-3 combo, other times it's a full job rotation. Either way, you'll find something suited for your rotation needs.
Changelog: Please check the project's GitHub or Discord for a full changelog.

Author: Liza Carvelli (Puni.sh) / NiGuangOwO (本地化适配)
Name: Palace Pal
Punchline: 在死宫、天宫和正统优雷卡显示潜在陷阱和埋藏的宝藏。
Description:
在死宫、天宫和正统优雷卡显示潜在陷阱和埋藏的宝藏。

这个插件需要Splatoon才能在屏幕上渲染绘图。

Description: This plugin will synchronize your Penumbra mods and current Glamourer state with other paired clients automatically.

Author: akira0245
Name: Radar
Description:
在屏幕和游戏地图上显示游戏实体的位置。
Displays game objects location on screen and map.
Punchline: Displays game objects location on screen and map.

Author: yomishino
Name: ActionEffectRange
Punchline: 显示技能的影响范围
Description:
This plugin provides a visual cue on the effect range of the AoE action you just used.

May be used as a supplement/replacement to the actions' VFXs in showing effect range related information, such as where has the action landed and how large an area it covered.

Author: gamous
Name: PostMeteion
Description: 梅蒂恩会执行光呆的指令并汇报成果，通过HttpApi与Webhook

Author: Meisterlala
Name: Neko Fans
Description:
Shows you an image of a random neko character. Click on the image to view the next one.
You can choose different image sources, allowing you to look at Catboys, Waifus, Cats, Dogs and more.

Supported APIs:
nekos.best, Nekos.life, Dog CEO, The Cat API, Pic.re, Waifu.im, Waifu.pics and shibe.online

Warning: You might see naughty images
Punchline: Frustrated in a dungeon? Look at a cute cat girl!

Author: KangasZ
Name: Kangas Tweaks Plugin
Punchline: Weather tracker and daily/weekly reset tracker
Description: Weather tracker and daily/weekly reset tracker

Author: KangasZ
Name: UI Anti AFK Kick
Punchline: No more wiggle checks!
Description: A Dalamud Plugin that will do afk-timers!

Author: grittyfrog
Name: Macro Mate (alpha)
Description:
Macro Mate lets you store and run an unlimited number of macros. You can also bind macros to normal macro slots.

For example, you can:

- Automatically swap in the correct raid macro when you enter an instance
- Store longer macros and automatically split them across multiple macro slots.
- Use almost any icon in the game for your Macros
Punchline: Store and run an unlimited number of macros. Bind them to normal macro slots.

Author: croizat
Name: CBT (formerly known as Automaton)
Punchline: Extra illegal
Description: Yet another tweaks collection plugin.

Author: Walter Stager (Caraxi)
Name: FPS Plugin (fork)
Description: Display game FPS. It really is that simple.

Name: Penny Pincher 69
Description: Copies the next value ending in 69 below cheapest offer.
Punchline: Copies the next value ending in 69 below cheapest offer.

Collects data on duty roulettes.
Data goes to a local database.

Author: Aida Enna
Name: Auto Login

Author: Aida Enna
Name: Food Check
Description: See who is missing food buff at countdown start and optionally post to party/echo chat with a customizable message.
Punchline: Someone in our group wouldn't eat their food. I got tired of telling them to. Now the plugin does.
Changelog: - Added the ability to post when people have under x minutes remaining on food buff

v6.0 (2023-01-11)

Author: Liza Carvelli
Name: Palace Pal
Description:
Shows possible trap & hoard coffer locations in Palace of the Dead & Heaven on High.

The default configuration requires Splatoon to be installed. If you do not wish to install Splatoon, you can switch to the experimental 'Simple' renderer in the configuration.
Punchline: Shows possible trap & hoard coffer locations in Palace of the Dead & Heaven on High.
Changelog:
v6.0 (2024-07-06)
- API 10

v5.4 (2023-11-14)
- Fix for dalamud's breaking titlebar change

v5.3 (2023-11-11)
- Update dependencies

v5.2 (2023-11-09)
- Update header icon logic for Dalamud changes

v5.1 (2023-10-11)
- Fix config window size constraints
- Replace outdated links
- Add Patreon link

Author: Liza Carvelli
Name: RetainerTrack
Description:
Keeps track of who a retainer belongs to - if you have seen the retainer's owner locally (if you were on the same party, or if you have seen an item crafted by them).

Tracking is unavailable if the crafter isn't the retainer owner (to avoid resellers being attributed incorrectly), and if the tooltip says 'Obtaining Signature'.
Punchline: Track who a retainer belongs to.
Changelog:
v4.3 (2024-07-16)
- Fix load error

v4.2 (2024-07-16)
- Add /accountid command
- use AccountId/ContentId properties from clientstructs instead of custom mapping

v4.1 (2024-07-04)
- Performance optimization

v4.0 (2024-07-02)
- API 10
- Remove LiteDB support

v3.2 (2024-06-16)
- Persistence fixes

Author: Liza Carvelli
Name: Discard Helper

- API 10

v5.3 (2024-04-20)
- Ensure no two discard processes run at the same time

Author: Liza Carvelli
Name: Questionable
Description:
A tiny little quest helper plugin, which does quests for you automatically where possible. Uses navmesh to automatically walk to all quest waypoints, and tries to automatically complete all steps along the way (excluding dungeons, single player duties and combat).

Not all quests are supported, check the discord or git repository for an up-to-date list.

Required Plugins: vnavmesh, TextAdvance, Lifestream
Punchline: A tiny quest helper plugin.
Changelog:
v3.13 (2024-11-03)
- Add initial set up window to check if all required plugins are enabled
- Add notifications for when manual interactions are required
- Add HW DRG quests, thanks to AnimaMachinae
- Add (partial) SB MCH quests, thanks to UcanPatates
- Add new Kojin daily quests, thanks to plogon_enjoyer
- Add Loporrit daily quests, thanks to pot0to
- Add 'Gilding the Bilious' (GC Aurum Vale quests)
- Add 'Braving New Depths' (Sunken Temple of Quarn)
- Add a missing NieR weekly quest
- Adjust jump timings in a few Mare Lamentorum quests
- Adjust some flying waypoints in Mare Lamentorum
- Adjust NPC follow distances in 'Scales of Blue' to hopefully fix a low-fps issue
- Fix some issues in THM quests added in v3.12
- Use modfiied pathfinding position when trying to fly from the Camp Dragonhead aetheryte to avoid navmesh trying to pathfind underground

v3.12 (2024-10-24)
- Add Ninja job quests, thanks to xan
- Add Rogue class quests
- Add Thaumaturge class quests, thanks to pot0to
- Add Amalj'aa, Kojin and Vanu Vanu quests, thanks to plogon_enjoyer
- Add Vath, Vanu Vanu and Loporrit quests, thanks to AnimaMachinae
- Add Loporrit and Omicron quests, thanks to pot0to
- Add more supported emotes
- Add NIN actions and skip conditions for NIN quests
- Add missing event quest config for All Saints Wake

v3.11 (2024-10-18)
- Add All Saints Wake quests
- Add Doman Adventurer's Guild/Doman Reconstruction starting quests
- Add dialogue choices for 'In from the Cold' & 'A Sleep Disturbed'
- Add Omicron daily quest, thanks to pot0to
- Experimentally handle item use in 'Strange Bedfellows', 'Petalouda Hunt' & 'With Folded Hands'

v3.10 (2024-10-12)
- Add Endwalker Hildibrand quests
- Add Garlemald side quests, thanks to goatzone
- Add AST class quests, thanks to kaiser
- Add Margrat reputation quest, thanks to kaiser
- Fix Yaana's Yarn, thanks to kaiser
- Fix 'Taking Stock' where RSR refuses to attack quest enemies
- Add delay to chat messages in 'Unto the Truth'
- Hide some 'ActionManager' info in quest window
- Make Comment field mandatory for manual interaction steps to make it clear what you're supposed to do
- Copying quest file names removes illegal path characters (e.g. `:`)
- Minor quest path updates

v3.9 (2024-10-05)
- Add Heavensward and Stormblood Hildibrand quests
- Automatically configure TextAdvance with recommended settings, thanks to Limiana
- Show validation errors in journal window
- Minor Endwalker path adjustments

轻量化、低性能消耗、简单的自动化功能/易用性改动合集, 帮你从一些无意义的重复性工作中解放出来
A collection of lightweight, simple automation features/easy-to-use modules to free you from meaningless repetitive tasks.

Author: Infi, Anna
Name: Chat 2
Description:
Chat 2 is a complete rewrite of the in-game chat window as a plugin.
It supports:

- Unlimited tabs
- Tabs that always send to a certain channel
- More flexible filtering
- RGB channel colouring
- Completely variable font size
- Sidebar tabs
- Unread counts
- Emotes
- Screenshot mode (obfuscate names)
